The announcement made by Gov: Greg Abbott on March 2 to end Texas' mask mandate and reopen businesses to full capacity, which sparked criticism from individuals who deemed it premature and dangerous.
The existence of a fake tweet attributed: Abbott that stated, "Unfortunately after the storm, some Texans were left alive. I have taken swift action to correct that." This tweet was not found on Abbott's official Twitter account.
Confirmation from Madi Biedermann: a spokesperson from Abbott's office, that the tweet in question was fake.
The image that accompanied the fake twee: but the poster confirmed it was posted satirically as a joke.
